description:
At Plymale & Dingus, We Get Results.

Call us at 614-385-0278.

The law firm of Plymale & Dingus is committed to providing exceptional legal counsel to people throughout Ohio. Clients choose our law firm because of our ability to obtain results and the personalized attention they receive throughout their case. Our attorneys are experienced trial lawyers, having fought for clients in more than 300 jury trials. 

We work hard for our clients because we understand how your case will affect you. Our clients' best interests are at the heart of what we do. The attorneys at our law firm have more than 60 years of combined experience representing clients in the areas of:

  • Personal injury
  • Family law and divorce
  • Criminal defense

We are very thorough in our preparation, leveraging the latest in technology to keep our clients informed and obtain a fair and equitable result.  

Personal injury work remains a cornerstone of our practice. Insurance companies all too often offer substantially less than a case is worth. We fight to help clients obtain the compensation they deserve. Since our firm's inception, we have recovered more than $40 million on behalf of our clients. 

When you are hurt in an accident, let us deal with the insurance company and medical expenses. We want you to worry about getting better. 

We offer free consultations to our client. If you are injured and unable to make it to our office, we can arrange to come to you. 

Our firm is proud to be GLBT-friendly. We are committed to ensuring that everyone has access to quality legal representation. We are sensitive to the issues that our gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgender clients may encounter, especially with respect to same-sex partnerships and parenting.

We are located at 136 W. Mound Street, Columbus, Ohio 43215
